name: s1_infer_torch
postAttachCommand:
bash -lc 'if [ -f /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh ]; then \
    tag="## <devcontainer conda auto-activate>"; \
    grep -q "$tag" ~/.bashrc || { \
      echo "$tag" >> ~/.bashrc; \
      echo ". /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh" >> ~/.bashrc; \
      echo "conda activate CONDANAME" >> ~/.bashrc; \
      echo "## </devcontainer conda auto-activate>" >> ~/.bashrc; \
    }; \
  fi'
